title: Change in Leadership
text:
[interrupt] → When you would mulligan, you may reveal this operation from HQ and set it aside. If you do, draw 1 fewer card for the mulligan, then return this operation to HQ.
Draw 2 cards. Shuffle 2 cards from HQ into R&D. Gain [click].
flavor: I promise I can turn this ship around, or I'll throw myself overboard.
